thread.title: Uber passenger went from Brixton to Croydon via Bristol
thread.title_full: Uber passenger went from Brixton to Croydon via Bristol

title: Uber passenger went from Brixton to Croydon via Bristol
text: Share this article Share Mr Wray had accidentally entered an address in Bristol, not Croydon, as his destination, according to an Uber spokesman. When he woke up in Bristol, his driver then offered to take the confused passenger home. Bemused friend Grace Kelly posted a picture of their conversation about the long journey When he woke up in Bristol, his driver then offered to take the confused passenger home. Mr Wray gave his driver one star for the journey. Bemused friend Grace Kelly tweeted a screenshot of the summary of Mr Wray's journey. In a message, he told her: 'Look at the start and end. 'Woke up and was like 2hrs and 30 mins to get home.' She asked: 'So were you actually in the Uber when it went to Bristol?' After the unfortunate incident, Uber said they will offer Mr Wray a refund. An Uber spokesman said: 'We've tried to contact the rider, but our systems show they set an address in Bristol as their destination. 'When they arrived and it became clear this was an error, the driver returned to London to drop them off in Croydon.' Share or comment on this article 59
